Striking an enemy with it will grant the player the Grax Boost buff for 10 seconds, which increases defense by 30, damage reduction by 10% and melee damage by 20%. Right clicking with the item causes the weapon to swing without the ability to cut down trees or destroy walls. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legen

name: The God's Gambit
description: The God's Gambit is a craftable Pre-Hardmode yoyo. While enemies are nearby, the yoyo will constantly drop slime blobs that apply the Slime debuff and damage enemies. When the yoyo returns to the player, another one will be automatically thrown if they are still holding the fire button. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Seabound Staff
description: The Seabound Staff is a Pre-Hardmode summon weapon that is dropped by the Desert Scourge. It summons a star-fish like minion, which follows the player and attacks enemies with short dashes, dealing damage on contact. Its best modifier is Mythical. While Ruthless may seem to provide a bigger damage by percentages, rounding reveals that Mythical and Ruthless boost the damage equally for this weapon. The Seabound Staff is rather slow to attack, but lunges similarly to the Eye of Cthulhu's second ph

name: Ocean Crest
description: The Ocean Crest is a Pre-Hardmode, Expert Mode-exclusive accessory obtained from the Treasure Bag dropped by the Desert Scourge. While equipped, it grants underwater breathing and prevents Crabs, Pink Jellyfish, Sea Snails, Sharks and Squids from doing damage and targeting the player. This item will not stack with the Aquatic Emblem or Gills buff. In the Abyss, equipping this item will only slow the speed at which breath is lost, rather than stop it from draining entirely. Aquatic Emblem

name: Rotten Brain
description: The Rotten Brain is a Pre-Hardmode, Expert Mode-exclusive accessory obtained from the Treasure Bag dropped by The Hive Mind. It will grant a 10% increase to all damage types when below 75% hp, decrease movement speed by 5% when below 50% health and makes shade rain down on you when you are hit. It is also sold by the Dryad after The Perforators are defeated. Shade rain deals magic damage and benefits from magic bonuses. However, its damage cannot be increased through any means. The shade rain ha

name: Shadowdrop Staff
description: Not to be confused with Shaderain Staff, a wand that summons a sentry-like cloud. The Shadowdrop Staff is a craftable Pre-Hardmode wand that can also drop from The Hive Mind. When used, it causes groups of thin, grey projectiles to fall from the sky, dealing damage to any enemy they touch. The fired projectiles cannot pass through blocks and cannot pierce enemies. It is the Corruption counterpart to the Blood Bath. Its best modifier is Mythical. This weapon is very useful to farm worm enemies or

name: Perfect Dark
description: The Perfect Dark is a craftable Pre-Hardmode broadsword that also drops from The Hive Mind. When swung, it fires a small spherical projectile that deals damage to the target hit and sticks to the first surface it touches. After sticking onto a surface for 4 seconds, it explodes - emitting purple particles and dealing damage to all enemies in a small radius. It is the Corruption counterpart to the Vein Burster. Its best modifier is Legendary. The weapon's name is a reference to the Nintendo 64 ga

name: Shadethrower
description: The Shadethrower is a craftable Pre-Hardmode flamethrower that is also dropped by The Hive Mind. It fires multiple dark flame-like particles that have infinite piercing but with limited range. Its best modifier is Unreal. This weapon does not have a Crimson variant. Unlike most flamethrowers, this weapon works underwater, as it fires a dark energy as opposed to fire. This weapon's name is a pun on the slang term "throwing shade," which is to publicly but subtly insult or criticize someone.

name: Rot Ball
description: Rot Balls are craftable Pre-Hardmode rogue weapons that are also dropped by The Hive Mind. They can pierce two enemies before breaking. They have a 50% chance of being recovered after being thrown. They function almost identically to Tooth Balls. Performing a stealth strike with Rot Balls causes a Shaderain cloud to spawn above every enemy that is hit. The cloud's raindrops damage enemies and inflict Cursed Inferno for 1.5 seconds. The Rot Ball cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have modif

name: Dank Staff
description: The Dank Staff is a craftable Pre-Hardmode summon weapon that can also be dropped by The Hive Mind. It is statistically identical to its Crimson counterpart, the Blood Clot Staff. When used, it summons a small dank creeper minion, which deals contact damage and will stay on enemies for as long as possible. Its best modifier is Mythical. While Ruthless may seem to provide a bigger damage by percentages, rounding reveals that Mythical and Ruthless boost the damage equally for this weapon. The Dank

name: Bloody Rupture
description: The Bloody Rupture is a craftable Pre-Hardmode shortsword that is also dropped by The Perforators. Upon killing an enemy with it, it will release orbs of blood that home in on other enemies, and upon impact, heal the player for 2 life. It functions identically to the Leeching Dagger. Like every shortsword, it has an incredibly short range, but unlike others, it swings automatically. Its best modifier is Legendary. If the player has the "Blood and Gore" Setting turned off, the blood orb projectil

name: Spore Knife
description: The Spore Knife is a craftable Pre-Hardmode shortsword. Upon hitting an enemy with this sword, they will release spore clouds, which damage enemies. While it has an incredibly short range like most shortswords, it also has auto-swing, rendering it slightly more effective. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Flameburst Shortsword
description: The Flameburst Shortsword is a craftable Pre-Hardmode shortsword that auto-swings. Hitting an enemy will make a small explosion. Like every shortsword, it has an incredibly short range. However, this shortsword can auto-swing. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Ancient Shiv
description: The Ancient Shiv is a Pre-Hardmode shortsword that is dropped by Dark Casters. Upon killing an enemy with this sword, they will release a small blue aura cloud that has infinite pierce and lingers for 5 seconds. The cloud deals 50% damage. While it has an incredibly short range like most shortswords, it also has auto-swing, rendering it slightly more effective. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Signus, Envoy of the Devourer
description: Signus, Envoy of the Devourer is a post-Moon Lord boss and is one of the Sentinels of the Devourer. It drops Twisting Nether which is a crafting material required to craft the Cosmic Worm. Signus is summoned by using the Rune of Kos in The Underworld at any time. Signus has 3 phases, each with their own unique behavior, appearance, and methods of attack. Signus cycles through these phases randomly; the same phase never appears twice in a row. Signus will always start the fight in Phase 1. Signus

name: Ores
description: Ores are primary crafting materials necessary for game progress. They usually must be crafted into bars at a Furnace, after which they can craft several essential tools, weapons, armor, and other items. Some items require raw ores themselves, most commonly potions. Raw ores can also be used as plain blocks for construction. The Calamity Mod adds 11 new ore blocks to the game, that are used to craft a variety of tools, weapons, and armor. With the exception of Sea Prism, Charred Ore, and Scoria O

name: Ashes of Annihilation
description: Ashes of Annihilation are post-Moon Lord crafting materials that drop exclusively from Supreme Calamitas in stacks of 20–30 / 30–40. They are mainly used to craft Shadowspec Bars and the Ceremonial Urn, a non-consumable summon for Supreme Calamitas. Ashes of Annihilation used to be exclusive to Expert Mode and above. The item was previously named 'Calamitous Essence'. The item's sell price's repeated usage of the number 6 is a reference to the biblical number of the beast, 666.

name: Ancient Fossil
description: The Ancient Fossil is a craftable Pre-Hardmode accessory crafted with 100 Silt Blocks or Slush Blocks. While equipped, it increases the wearer's pickaxe speed by 15% while in the Underground or Cavern layer. This speed increase applies when the player is at least below surface level, but they must also be above The Underworld. The item's sprite is based on an Ammonite fossil.

name: Flarefrost Blade
description: The Flarefrost Blade is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that auto-swings. When swung, it shoots small homing projectiles that inflict the On Fire! and Frostburn debuffs upon hitting an enemy. The projectiles will disappear after a short time. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Galaxia
description: Galaxia is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that is an upgraded version of the Omega Biome Blade. It fires 3 Galaxian Stars when swung, which are capable of piercing twice, ignoring tiles, and strongly homing into enemies. On hit, stars spawn an additional projectile depending on the biome the player is in. Certain biomes will also debuff the target for 20 seconds alongside spawning a projectile. Upon hitting any enemy with the blade itself or any of the homing stars, the player will be giv

name: Vein Burster
description: The Vein Burster is a craftable Pre-Hardmode broadsword that also drops from The Perforators. When swung, it fires a small spherical projectile that deals damage to the target hit and sticks to the first surface it touches. After sticking onto a surface for 4 seconds, it explodes - emitting red projectiles and dealing damage to all enemies in a small radius. It is the Crimson counterpart to the Perfect Dark. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Corrupted Crusher Blade
description: The Corrupted Crusher Blade is a craftable Pre-Hardmode broadsword. When swung, it emits glowing purple particles and inflicts the Cursed Inferno debuff upon striking enemies. While no bosses are alive, critical strikes caused by this weapon reduce the target's base defense by 10, which cannot stack with itself. Its best modifier is Legendary. It is considered a good early game weapon due to its high damage and low crafting cost. It is the Corruption variant of the Crimson Crusher Blade.

name: Night's Stabber
description: The Night's Stabber is a craftable Pre-Hardmode shortsword. Upon hitting an enemy with it, the enemy will release a homing projectile. While it has an incredibly short range like most shortswords, it also has auto-swing, rendering it slightly more effective. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Caustic Edge
description: The Caustic Edge is a craftable Pre-Hardmode broadsword. On hit, it inflicts the Poisoned and Venom debuffs. Its best modifier is Legendary. The Caustic Edge is available after defeating the Brain of Cthulhu or Eater of Worlds; as a result, it can be a particularly strong weapon for its tier before being replaced by stronger weapons.

name: Plague Charger
description: Plague Chargers are Hardmode enemies that spawn in the Jungle after the Golem has been defeated. They come in two different variations, normal and large, with varying size, health, damage, and loot. Several Plague Chargers of both sizes are also summoned by The Plaguebringer Goliath boss and the Plaguebringer miniboss. Plague Chargers summoned by The Plaguebringer Goliath and the Plaguebringer do not count toward the Plague Charger kill count and are not affected by the Banner buff. It appears t

name: Earth
description: Earth is a craftable post-Moon Lord developer broadsword. Every time the sword strikes an enemy, its defense will be lowered by 1. Additionally upon striking an enemy, the player is healed by 1 to 68 life, and three multicolored meteors rain from the top of the screen to the cursor's position, phasing through tiles. Each meteor will inflict the On Fire!, Cursed Inferno, and Frostburn debuffs. Upon contact with an enemy, or after travelling a short length, the meteor will split into eight red, gr

Not to be confused with Anahita, the boss that is summoned when it dies. ??? is a Pre-Hardmode stationary enemy that spawns in the Ocean. When it is killed, it summons Anahita. It can drop the powerful Aquatic Heart accessory at any point in the game. It can also be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer. Due to its ability to spawn in Pre-Hardmode, it is possible to kill it and summon the powerful boss(es) by accident. However, this is not recommended as this boss can easily one-hit the player in Pr

name: Unholy Core
description: Unholy Cores are a Hardmode crafting material crafted with Charred Ore and Hellstone. It is used to craft several weapons, the Blood Relic summoning item, and Ashen furniture. 5-15 Unholy Cores can additionally be obtained from Brimstone Crates at a 50% drop chance after Brimstone Elemental has been defeated.

name: Burnt Sienna
description: The Burnt Sienna is a Pre-Hardmode broadsword that drops from Tomb Crawlers. When swung, the blade releases cosmetic light particles. Upon killing an enemy, three small, bright-yellow orbs will shoot out, which will heal the player for 3 HP when picked up. Its best modifier is Legendary. The orbs spawned by upon killing an enemy will home-in on the player if they have the Heartreach buff. "Burnt sienna" is a reddish-brown color, which this sword approximately features. The Burnt Sienna was forme

name: Marnite Obliterator
description: The Marnite Obliterator is a craftable Pre-Hardmode Drill and Axe combination. It can mine blocks up to Gold Ore / Platinum Ore. Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase its average damage output by the same amount. Mechanical tools can only have universal prefixes, because they can't have their speed modified. It can be crafted before defeating any boss, making it a good tool to stick with until the player acquires a Nightmare or Deathbringer Pickaxe. Marnite is a portmant

name: Charred Ore
description: Charred Ore is a Hardmode ore that generates in the Brimstone Crag upon world creation. It is used to craft Unholy Cores at a Hellforge. It requires at least a Mythril or Orichalcum Pickaxe to mine. It can also be obtained from Charred Slimes. Charred Ore cannot be destroyed by explosives. One of its previous sprites had a similar appearance to an old sprite of the Arena Block.

name: Shardlight Pickaxe
description: The Shardlight Pickaxe is a craftable Hardmode pickaxe capable of mining Adamantite Ore and Titanium Ore. On strike, it inflicts the Frostburn debuff. Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for this tool.

name: Seismic Hampick
description: The Seismic Hampick is a Hardmode Pickaxe and Hammer combination capable of mining blocks up to Lihzahrd Brick and Scoria Ore. Left clicking allows it to be used as a pickaxe, while right clicking allows it to be used as a hammer. Both modes automatically swing, emit fiery particles, and inflict the On Fire! debuff on contact. Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for thi

name: Beastial Pickaxe
description: The Beastial Pickaxe is a craftable Hardmode pickaxe capable of mining Chlorophyte Ore. It emits green light particles when swung, and inflicts the Venom debuff on strike. Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for this tool.

name: Blossom Pickaxe
description: The Blossom Pickaxe is a craftable post-Moon Lord pickaxe capable of mining Auric Ore. It has +5 increased block breaking range and produces green light particles when swung. Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for this tool. The Blossom Pickaxe is tied with the Astral Pickaxe for third highest mining speed, after the Shroomite Digging Claw and Crystyl Crusher.

name: Genesis Pickaxe
description: The Genesis Pickaxe is a craftable post-Moon Lord pickaxe capable of mining Uelibloom Ore. It has the same pickaxe power as the Luminite Pickaxes. It has +4 increased block breaking range and produces magenta light particles when swung. Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for this tool. This item was previously known as the "Gallant Pickaxe".

name: Crystyl Crusher
description: The Crystyl Crusher is a craftable post-Moon Lord developer pickaxe. When used, it fires a beam capable of destroying any block in its way that follows the mouse cursor. The beam takes about 1.67 seconds to charge up, and has a reach of 150 blocks. The color of the beam alternates between magenta and blue. Right-clicking with the Crystyl Crusher will cause it to function as a normal pickaxe without a swing animation. Speed modifiers have no effect on this pickaxe, so its best modifier is Massive

name: Plague Cell Canister
description: Plague Cell Canisters are a Hardmode crafting material that are dropped by various plague-related enemies in the Jungle after the Golem has been defeated. 3-6 Plague Cell Canisters can be obtained from Jungle Crates once Golem is defeated.

name: Waraxe
description: The Waraxe is a Pre-Hardmode axe that drops from Skeletons, Hoplites, Armored Skeletons and Skeleton Archers. Critical strikes inflict the War Cleave debuff, which reduces the hit enemy's defense by 15 and damage reduction by 25%, for 15 seconds. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes. Although it has axe power, it is excellent to acquire early on to use as a weapon, due to its high base damage and powerful debuff. Since the Waraxe is technically a t

name: Axe of Purity
description: The Axe of Purity is a craftable Hardmode axe that is the direct upgrade of the Feller of Evergreens. When left clicked it could be used as an axe, while right clicking produces light particles when swung and fires damaging Purification Powder that spreads the Purity and hurts enemies for 85% of the axe's damage. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes. The Axe of Purity can purify a Tortured Soul. Only the left-click attack receives true melee boosts

name: Inferna Cutter
description: The Inferna Cutter is a craftable Hardmode axe that produces light particles when swung, and is the direct upgrade of the Axe of Purity. It inflicts the Brimstone Flames and On Fire! debuff when striking an enemy and causes an explosion when landing critical hits. On swing, it releases several sparks similar to those fired by the Wand of Sparking. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

name: Berserker Waraxe
description: The Berserker Waraxe is a craftable Hardmode axe that, when swung, produces a small amount of light particles. On hit, it inflicts the Venom debuff. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

name: Tectonic Truncator
description: The Tectonic Truncator is a craftable Hardmode axe that, when swung, produces light particles. On strike, it inflicts the On Fire! debuff. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes. This tool used to be known as "Chaoswarped Slashaxe".

name: IOU an item
description: The IOU an item was a Pre-Hardmode crafting material that was dropped by the Siren and Leviathan in Pre-Hardmode in place of their regular drops. It could be crafted into any of the boss's weapons when combined with a Living Shard. An "IOU" (abbreviation for "I owe you") is a document stating one's debt to another. In the case of this item, the debt is a drop from The Leviathan. Despite the Siren and Leviathan dropping their weapons after the Wall of Flesh had been defeated at the time it existe

name: Marnite Spear
description: The Marnite Spear is a craftable Pre-Hardmode spear that autoswings. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Marnite is a portmanteau of the words marble and granite, which is what the weapon is made of. The Marnite Bayonet, a pre-boss gun. The Marnite Obliterator, a pre-boss drill/axe combo tool.

name: Overloaded Blaster
description: The Overloaded Blaster is a Pre-Hardmode flamethrower that is dropped by The Slime God. It fires a spray of 5 small projectiles in a wide, random spread. The projectiles bounce once off of tiles, then fall to the ground once they bounce. Its best modifier is Unreal. The Overloaded Blaster noticeably differs from other flamethrowers, lacking a well-defined stream or the typical sound effect. However, it is alike them in that it consumes Gel as ammo and is affected by the Shroomite Visage. The wea

name: Brimblade
description: The Brimblade is a craftable Hardmode rogue boomerang made from Unholy Cores at a Hardmode Anvil. When used, it auto-throws a series of brimstone blades. When a blade strikes an enemy, it will split into 3 blades, which return to the player shortly after being released. The split blades deal 30% less damage than the main blade. Every blade inflicts the Brimstone Flames debuff and emits a burst of red particles on contact. Performing a stealth strike with the Brimblade causes three brimstone dart

name: Brimrose Staff
description: Not to be confused with Brimrose, a post-Moon Lord mount-summoning item. The Brimrose Staff is a craftable Hardmode wand. When used, it fires a single short laser beam that instantly splits into two beams, with the resulting beams also splitting into two more beams. There are a total of four splits, resulting in an immediate flower of 16 beam-endings being created a short distance from the player in the direction fired. The beams inflict the Brimstone Flames debuff and do not pierce enemies. The

name: Brimlash
description: The Brimlash is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that auto-swings. It fires out a damaging projectile that splits into 2 homing projectiles upon hitting an object or reaches the end of its range. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Brimstone Fury
description: The Brimstone Fury is a craftable Hardmode bow. When used, it shoots 3 arrows in a slight spread. If Wooden Arrows are used as ammo, arrows are converted into three fast brimstone laser bolts with a slight spread. The bolts dissipate upon impact with tiles and do not pierce enemies. Upon hitting an enemy, the bolts inflict the Brimstone Flames debuff. Its best modifier is Unreal.

name: Burning Sea
description: The Burning Sea is a craftable Hardmode spell tome that, when used, automatically fires fast brimstone fireballs which are affected by gravity and bounce off of tiles. The fireballs can bounce 3 times and pierce 2 enemies, and each last 5 seconds before disappearing. Upon contact with water, the fireballs transform into 3 or 4 small homing flares which shoot upward at random angles, dealing 1.35x the weapon's damage and dissipate upon impact with tiles or enemies. Its best modifier is Mythical.

name: Brimstone Sword
description: The Brimstone Sword is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It inflicts the Brimstone Flames debuff and summons a small brimstone geyser when an enemy is hit with the blade. When using alternate fire, the sword is thrown in a manner similar to that of the Ichor Spear. The thrown sword can travel a long distance before being affected by gravity and pierces infinitely. On hitting an enemy, it will create a short lingering explosion that deals 50% of the weapon's damage. Its best modifi

name: Depth Crusher
description: The Depth Crusher is a Pre-Hardmode hammer that is dropped by Moray Eels. When swung, it releases aesthetic water droplet particles and inflicts the Crush Depth debuff upon striking enemies. Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes. This item was formerly known as the "Depth Blade" and lacked hammer functionality.

name: Warblade
description: The Warblade is a Pre-Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It is dropped by Goblin Warriors. Critical hits done by the Warblade will inflict the War Cleave debuff, lowering enemy defense by 15 and DR by 25%. Its best modifier is Legendary. Waraxe

name: Aorta
description: The Aorta is a craftable Pre-Hardmode yoyo that is also dropped from The Perforators. When held out it fires a homing blood clot towards nearby enemies that deals 25% of the weapon's base damage. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Much like the Air Spinner, this yoyo is especially nimble and can move very quickly while in use. This weapon does not have a Corruption variant. It shares its name with the aorta, which is the largest artery in the body.

name: Eviscerator
description: The Eviscerator is a craftable Pre-Hardmode gun that can also be dropped by The Perforators. When Musket Balls are used as ammo, it fires a medium-speed blood clot projectile that does a large amount of damage for its tier. However, the Eviscerator has one of the slowest firing speeds of all ranged weaponry, meaning it has a somewhat low DPS, despite the high base damage. The blood clot does not pierce enemies. Its best modifier is Unreal. Because it fires a special projectile, it will not be af

name: Blood Clot Staff
description: The Blood Clot Staff is a craftable Pre-Hardmode summon weapon that can also be dropped by The Perforators. It is statistically identical to its Corruption equivalent, the Dank Staff. It summons a meaty blood clot minion, which follows the player and attacks enemies. It deals contact damage, and will stay on enemies for as long as possible. Its best modifier is Mythical. While Ruthless may seem to provide a bigger damage by percentages, rounding reveals that Mythical and Ruthless boost the damag

name: Tooth Ball
description: Tooth Balls are craftable Pre-Hardmode rogue weapons that are also dropped by The Perforators. They can pierce two enemies before breaking. They have a 50% chance of being recovered after being thrown. They function almost identically to Rot Balls. Performing a stealth strike with Tooth Balls causes crimson clouds to spawn above each enemies that are hit. The cloud's raindrops inflict Burning Blood for 1.5 seconds. The Tooth Ball cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have modifiers. This weap

name: Night's Ray
description: The Night's Ray is a craftable Pre-Hardmode wand. It creates a purple particle beam whichs creates 4 homing, non-piercing beams upon hitting an enemy. Hitting more than one enemy will not create more beams. It is made with Rotten Matter in Corruption worlds and is the Corruption counterpart to the Carnage Ray. Its best modifier is Mythical. The accuracy of the homing beams and the infinite piercing means it can easily damage all of The Hungries during the Wall of Flesh fight. It can be considere

name: Storm Ruler
description: The Storm Ruler is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. When swung it shoots out a projectile which, upon impact with an enemy or tile, spawns a small tornado similar to the one the Cloud Elemental spawns. The tornado lingers for 10 seconds, hits 4 times per second with infinite piercing, dealing damage to enemies that come in contact with it. The tornado also pulls in enemies similarly to the Wind Blade. Its best modifier is Legendary. Astrum Deus takes only 50% damage from the Stor

name: Glacial Crusher
description: The Glacial Crusher is a Hardmode broadsword that is dropped by Cryogen. When swung, it fires a slow, icy projectile that does not pierce. The farther the projectile travels, the more damage it will do and the longer it will inflict the Glacial State debuff. Enemies affected by Glacial State take three times as much damage from the blade. If the projectile has not been out for longer than half a second, it will not inflict Glacial State. The maximum duration the projectile can inflict Glacial St

name: Greentide
description: The Greentide is a Hardmode broadsword with autoswing, which is dropped by the Leviathan and Anahita. Upon striking an enemy with it, teeth will rain from the sky towards the cursor's position. Each tooth will inflict the Venom debuff for 6 seconds. Its best modifier is Legendary. Green tide is the term given to large accumulations of green seaweed which harbor large amounts of algae that can be harmful to marine wildlife.

name: Abyss Blade
description: The Abyss Blade is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that is the direct upgrade to the Depth Crusher. When swung, it fires short-ranged tridents that deals 67% of the weapon's base damage, does not pierce enemies, and explode after traveling a short distance or contacting a block. Both the sword and the projectile inflict the Crush Depth debuff. Its best modifier is Legendary. Although its predecessor functions as a hammer, this weapon does not have any hammer properties.

name: Anarchy Blade
description: The Anarchy Blade is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that auto-swings. Striking an enemy will release red particles and inflict the Brimstone Flames debuff. 10% of the user's missing health is added to the base damage of this sword. If the user is below 50% health, every swing has a 20% chance to instantly kill any non-boss enemy. Its best modifier is Legendary. This weapon was originally designed to be a reference to the Devil's Sunrise sword from the Epic Battle Fantasy game series. A separate

name: Baleful Harvester
description: The Baleful Harvester is a craftable Hardmode broadsword. Upon striking enemies with the blade, homing pumpkins and fiery orange skulls will spawn off-screen and attack enemies in the same fashion as The Horseman's Blade. Both projectiles deal 150% of the weapon's base damage and skulls split into 2 homing fire orbs which each deal 50% of the weapon's base damage. The sword, the skulls and their fire orbs inflict the On Fire! debuff. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Desert Feather
description: The Desert Feather is a Pre-Hardmode crafting material that drops from Vultures in the Desert biome. It is used in recipes for some weapons, the Desert Prowler armor set, and the Sandstorm in a Bottle accessory.

name: The Enforcer
description: The Enforcer is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. Upon hitting an enemy with the blade, essence flames will appear near the enemy that will attack nearby enemies. Essence flames deal 25% of the sword's damage. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Teardrop Cleaver
description: The Teardrop Cleaver is a Pre-Hardmode broadsword that drops from the Eye of Cthulhu in Malice Mode. It inflicts the Temporal Sadness debuff upon striking enemies, which reduces enemy contact damage and movement speed. Its best modifier is Legendary. This is a very powerful weapon early game, as the debuff it inflicts effectively stuns most enemies it hits on top of reducing their damage. Even after more powerful weapons are acquired, it may be worth keeping as a sidearm purely for the debuff. I

name: Opal Striker
description: The Opal Striker is a craftable Pre-Hardmode gun that is an upgrade of the Flintlock Pistol. It fires four projectiles in quick succession, consuming four bullets with pauses between volleys. Each bullet has a use time of 5. Its best modifier is Unreal. But the weapon's knockback will not be affected due to already being 0. Although the projectiles appear to grow in size as they travel, their hit profile does not change from that of a standard bullet. Unlike the Clockwork Assault Rifle, the Opal

name: Titanium Railgun
description: The Titanium Railgun is a craftable Hardmode gun that fires a laser of light particles in a straight line and pierces up to five enemies. Its best modifier is Unreal. This weapon does not have an Adamantite gun counterpart. The light particles fired by the weapon have an extremely long life span and are not affected by gravity, making it an excellent way to illuminate large swaths of underground areas. The piercing properties of this weapon make it extremely potent against segmented enemies and

name: Slag Magnum
description: The Slag Magnum is a Hardmode gun that is dropped by Earth Elementals. When Musket Balls are used as ammo, it fires a special bullet that inflicts the Armor Crunch debuff on targets for a short time, which reduces their defense by 15, and splits into 4 small shards on impact which deal 35% of the original bullet's damage. Its best modifier is Unreal. Because of the high armor reduction, it is much more effective on enemies with high defense. This means it can be quite potent as a support weapon

name: Alpha Ray
description: The Alpha Ray is a craftable post-Moon Lord magic gun with two firing modes. The left-click mode has three main parallel laser beams and also shoots laser projectiles rapidly. The right-click mode shoots a beam that splits into two like the Genisis, although lacking the scattered laser-fire. All projectiles fired from this weapon travel through blocks and all particle beams pierce indefinitely. The three particle beams deal 80% of the weapon's damage, the secondary-fire's beam deals 166.25% of t

name: Wingman
description: The Wingman is a Hardmode magic gun that auto-fires sets of three overlapping laser beams which do not pierce enemies. It is dropped by Martian Walkers and two are required to craft the Alpha Ray. Its best modifier is Mythical. A wingman is a supporting pilot that protects the main aircraft. This is seen in the appearance of the Alpha Ray, where two of it are situated alongside the Genisis. The Wingman was implemented based on a community suggestion made by Gouvod on the mod's Terraria Forums po

name: Genisis
description: The Genisis is a craftable post-Moon Lord magic gun that shoots a large concentrated beam. The main beam ignores damage frames, pierces enemies, and splits into two more beams when it reaches its maximum range. It also rapidly fires inaccurate smaller laser beams that cannot go through walls and do not pierce enemies. The smaller laser beams disappear after a short time. Its best modifier is Godly or Mythical. The Mythical modifier cannot affect use time nor mana cost, making it identical to God

name: Cosmic Kunai
description: The Cosmic Kunai is a post-Moon Lord dagger dropped by Signus, Envoy of the Devourer. It rapidly fires a stream of quick-moving, short-range kunai that pass through tiles and are not affected by gravity. The kunai turn transparent as they travel; however, this does not affect their damage and is only an aesthetic addition. The kunai also very slightly curves toward nearby enemies. Performing a stealth strike with the Cosmic Kunai will deal 321% damage and cause five Cosmic Scythes to release aro

name: Floodtide
description: The Floodtide is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that auto-swings. The weapon can also be obtained by fishing after Calamitas has been defeated and while under the effect of the Gills buff. When swinging the sword, it launches 2 shark-shaped projectiles which deal damage to enemies on contact. Its best modifier is Legendary. This item will only be caught with a 1/25 (4%) chance when fishing with between 60 and 160 fishing power and having the Gills buff. The weapon replaced Mariana in Terratomer

name: Crimsaber
description: The Crimsaber was a craftable Hardmode broadsword. Upon striking an enemy, it inflicted the Ichor debuff and many streams of ichor would rain from the sky towards the player's cursor. The streams also inflicted the Ichor debuff and could pierce up to 5 enemies, but could not pass through blocks. Its best modifier was Legendary. Its function was similar to that of Bladetongue, which can be obtained around the same time, as they are both swords that summon ichor streams upon contact with enemies.

name: Excalibur Shortsword
description: The Excalibur Shortsword is a craftable Hardmode shortsword that autoswings. It emits light with a sparkle effect when swung. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Elemental Eruption
description: The Elemental Eruption is a craftable post-Moon Lord flamethrower that fires clusters of rainbow flames, which inflict numerous debuffs onto enemies. The flames can pierce one enemy, and as with all flamethrowers of its type, it auto-fires. The debuffs it inflicts are as follows: On Fire! for 5 seconds Cursed Inferno for 2 seconds Frostburn for 5 seconds Brimstone Flames for 2 seconds Plague for 2 seconds On enemies, these combined debuffs cause the target to be unable to regenerate health, and

name: Grand Guardian
description: The Grand Guardian is a craftable Hardmode broadsword and is the direct upgrade to the Majestic Guard. It does not shoot a projectile and has a very large melee range, similar to its downgrade. Every time it strikes an enemy, its defense will be lowered by 1, and if the sword hits an enemy with 0 or less defense the player heals 4 life. Striking enemies causes large explosions similar to the explosions created by the Inferno Fork which deal 50% of the weapon's base damage, decreasing by 10% for

name: Majestic Guard
description: The Majestic Guard is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. While it does not shoot a projectile, it has a very large range and enough knockback to keep most Hardmode enemies away from the player. Every time it strikes an enemy, its defense will be lowered by 1. If the hit enemy's defense is less than or equal to 0 when struck, the player is healed for 3 HP. This effect works on any enemy, including bosses. Its best modifier is Legendary. The defense reduction applied by the weapon ca

name: True Caustic Edge
description: The True Caustic Edge is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. When swung, it fires a high-velocity, yellow sword beam that can bounce or pierce up to two times, and deals 75% of the weapon's damage. It inflicts the Venom and On Fire! debuffs to hit enemies. Its best modifier is Legendary. The True Caustic Edge is available shortly after entering Hardmode; as a result, it is particularly useful as a starting weapon before being replaced by stronger weapons.

name: Tyrant Yharim's Ultisword
description: If you were looking for something other than the Tyrant Yharim's Ultisword, see Yharim (disambiguation). The Tyrant Yharim's Ultisword is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It will shoot out a red blade which homes in on enemies and gradually slows to a stop, similar to the blades created by Pumpking. Upon hitting an enemy with the sword itself, it will have a 50% chance to give the Tyrant's Fury buff to the player, increasing melee damage by 30% and melee critical hit chance by 10

name: True Tyrant's Ultisword
description: The True Tyrant's Ultisword is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. On each swing it fires one of three projectiles, chosen at random. Each projectile can pass through walls and hit 5 times before dissipating, and their piercing abilities vary as a result of their different damage-dealing speeds. None of the projectiles fired by the Ultisword can home in on enemies who are behind walls, nor can they chase enemies if inside a wall. If not chasing a foe, the projectiles will grad

name: Greatsword of Judgement
description: The Greatsword of Judgement is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. Upon swinging the sword, a small and infinitely piercing white orb is fired, which slowly homes into a nearby enemy. Every one-tenth of a second, two larger white orbs are fired out on either side of the small orb, which travels a short distance before disappearing on enemy hit or after one second. After one second passes, the small orb dissipates, and homing white rain rapidly drop down every one-tenth of a se

name: Frost Bolt
description: The Frost Bolt is a craftable Pre-Hardmode spell tome that auto-fires a slow-moving ball of ice, similar to the Water Bolt, inflicting the Frostburn debuff. The projectile travels in a straight line unaffected by gravity, emit a bit of light, which can hit 2 enemies or bounce off 2 walls before dissipating. Its best modifier is Mythical. The Frost Bolt is an easily accessible spell tome for a starting player, only requiring a short trip to the Snow biome to gather the required ingredients.

name: Flare Bolt
description: The Flare Bolt is a craftable Pre-Hardmode spell tome that auto-fires a ball of fire that inflicts the On Fire! debuff. The projectile travels in a straight line, is unaffected by gravity, emits a dim light, and can damage 3 enemies or bounce off of 3 walls before dissipating. Its best modifier is Mythical.

name: Frigidflash Bolt
description: The Frigidflash Bolt is a craftable Hardmode spell tome that is an upgrade of both Frost Bolt and Flare Bolt. It fires a slow-moving ball of flash-freezing magma that can be autofired. The projectile travels in a straight line, emits a bit of light, is unaffected by gravity, can pierce through 4 enemies and can bounce off 4 walls. It inflicts the On Fire! and the Frostburn debuff on hit enemies. Its best modifier is Mythical.

name: Murasama
description: "It was tempered by the fires which are fueled by spirits, and formed in the magma I draw into my laboratories." Not to be confused with Muramasa, a vanilla broadsword. The Murasama is a post-Moon Lord melee weapon resembling a sword. It can be found in The Underworld's Bio-center Arsenal Lab, contained within a Security Chest. Although Murasama is technically obtainable in Pre-Hardmode, it cannot be swung until Jungle Dragon, Yharon has been defeated in the current world. It possesses a larger

name: True Excalibur Shortsword
description: The True Excalibur Shortsword is a craftable Hardmode shortsword that autoswings. On each swing, it fires a projectile that pierces twice before stopping on the third enemy. The projectile only moves horizontally to the left or right. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: True Night's Stabber
description: The True Night's Stabber is a craftable Hardmode shortsword that autoswings. On each swing, it fires a projectile that pierces twice before stopping on the third enemy. The projectile only moves horizontally to the left or right. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Terra Shiv
description: The Terra Shiv is a craftable Hardmode shortsword that autoswings. On each swing it will fire a shot that will pierce three times before stopping on the fourth enemy. The projectile only moves horizontally to the left or right. Its best modifier is Legendary. This weapon is the shortsword counterpart to the Terra Blade, and as such, everything in its crafting tree are shortsword equivalents of their Vanilla forms.

name: Elemental Shiv
description: The Elemental Shiv is a craftable post-Moon Lord shortsword that autoswings. It fires a homing projectile that can pass through blocks but cannot pierce enemies. Once these projectiles impact an enemy, six magical shivs are summoned off-screen to the left and right-side of the player, flying towards the hit enemy. As with the initial projectile, the summoned shivs will pierce blocks. The initial projectile will fire horizontally to the right or left, until enemies are nearby, which will cause th

name: Apoctosis Array
description: The Apoctosis Array is a craftable post-Moon Lord magic gun that is a direct upgrade to the Ion Blaster. Like its predecessor, it fires ion blasts that continuously accelerate with their damage depending on the user's current mana level. The projectile damage is multiplied by 0.2 added to 1.4 times of the player's mana ratio, dealing 20% damage at 0 mana and 160% damage at full mana. Additionally, the projectile size is multiplied by 0.75 added to 0.75 times of the player's mana ratio, being 75%

name: True Bloody Edge
description: The True Bloody Edge is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It is a direct upgrade to the Bloody Edge and can be used to craft the Terra Blade or Terra Edge. On each swing, it fires out a yellow sword projectile that can pierce 2 targets before dissipating on the third. If an enemy is hit by the sword itself, there is a 50% chance for the player to be healed for 1 to 6 hp. Both the sword and the projectile inflict the Ichor and Burning Blood debuffs for 1 second. It is an alternativ

name: Malevolence
description: The Malevolence is a Hardmode bow that is dropped by The Plaguebringer Goliath. It fires two arrows in a slight spread. If Wooden Arrows are used as ammo, the arrows are replaced with plague arrows that explode into bees upon tile or enemy contact, inflicting the Plague debuff onto any hit enemy. Its best modifier is Unreal.

name: Ark of the Cosmos
description: The Ark of the Cosmos is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. It is the final upgrade of the Ark of the Ancients and Biome Blade. It fires an Eon Beam of random colors when swung, including pink, green, blue, and orange. These beams can pierce twice and ignore tiles, inflicting the Elemental Mix debuff on hit. Each beam color also has varying immunity frames on hit, with pink at a highest value of 6 and decreasing in the mentioned order to orange's value of 3. A column of four

name: Effluvium Bow
description: The Effluvium Bow is a Hardmode bow that is dropped by Cryogen. When fired, two arrows are shot in a random spread. If Wooden Arrows are used as ammo, the arrows are converted into icy mist arrows, which inflict the Frostburn and Glacial State debuffs. Its best modifier is Unreal. An effluvium is a harmful or pungent odor.

name: Azathoth
description: The Azathoth is a craftable post-Moon Lord yoyo. While in use, the Azathoth constantly releases pink cosmic orbs. Each cosmic orb can fire up to six hitscan lasers at nearby enemies before vanishing. The orbs, their lasers, and the yoyo itself all ignore NPC immunity frames, allowing the Azathoth to damage enemies unbelievably rapidly. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Ruthless might be preferred if the player already has 100% critical strike chance. The Azath

name: Red Sun
description: The Red Sun is a craftable post-Moon Lord developer broadsword. When it is swung, a large number of solar flares fall from the sky at varying speeds and angles. The flares explode after some time or upon hitting an enemy, releasing multiple homing fragments when they do. Both the flares and the fragments ignore tiles. The blade, the flares, and the fragments all inflict Holy Flames. This can be considered the upgrade of the Celestial Claymore. Its best modifier is Legendary. Red Sun is one of se

name: Calamity Eye
description: Calamity Eyes are Pre-Hardmode enemies that spawn in the Brimstone Crag. They act like Demon Eyes, but will inflict the Brimstone Flames and Weak debuffs on contact. When below half health, their speed and maneuverability increase. In Death Mode, Calamity Eyes are capable of becoming intangible and passing through blocks for a brief period of time, in order to reach the player. After Providence, the Profaned Goddess is defeated, their stats receive a significant boost and they begin dropping Blo

name: Phoenix Blade
description: The Phoenix Blade is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. Like the Breaker Blade, it has a very large range, but it also causes explosions and spawns healing orbs when killing enemies. The healing orbs restore 10 health when touched, and disappear after about 3 seconds or if the orb hits a solid tile. The sword itself is extremely large, larger than the Breaker Blade and many other swords in the game. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Triactis' True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might
description: Triactis' True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might is a craftable post-Moon Lord developer boomerang. It is the final upgrade to the Pwnagehammer. When in use, it rapidly throws an enormous image of the hammer that passes through tiles. The hammer can pierce through an unlimited number of enemies and each hit on an enemy causes an explosion of bright blue and green particles. The explosion deals 25% of the damage of the hammer, ignores immunity frames, and deals typeless damage. Its best modifier is

name: Shredder
description: The Shredder is a craftable post-Moon Lord gun. The primary fire (left-click) shoots a barrage of fast-moving blue energy bolts which split off in many directions and speeds upon impacting any enemy or tile and deal 85% damage. The secondary fire (right-click) shoots an equivalent barrage of normal bullets. Both firing modes shoot an identical number of projectiles and have the same firing speed and spread pattern. Each shot has a use time of 3. Its best modifier is Unreal. The Shredder's second

name: Devil's Devastation
description: The Devil's Devastation is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. It is the upgraded combination of both the Devastation and the True Forbidden Oathblade. When swung, the Devil's Devastation rapidly fires spreads of three purple demon scythes in the cursor's direction and launches three pitchforks from below towards the cursor's location. Critical hits additionally summon purple explosions on the target. It also inflicts several debuffs on enemies: The sword itself inflicts On Fi

name: Leeching Dagger
description: The Leeching Dagger is a craftable Pre-Hardmode shortsword that is also dropped by The Hive Mind. Upon hitting an enemy with it, it will release leech orbs that home in on other enemies, and upon impact, heal the player for 2 life. It functions identically to the Bloody Rupture. Like every shortsword, it has an incredibly short range, but unlike others, it swings automatically. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Feralthorn Claymore
description: The Feralthorn Claymore is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. Upon hitting an enemy, two pillars of thorns will rise up from random locations around the player, striking enemies from below but not piercing through them. The blade itself inflicts the Venom debuff. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Forsaken Saber
description: The Forsaken Saber is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. Every swing releases a whirling blade projectile, which remains in place for about 1 second after launch and then rapidly moves in the direction of the cursor, damaging the first enemy hit. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Bloody Edge
description: The Bloody Edge is a craftable Pre-Hardmode broadsword. It is the Crimson variant of the Night's Edge and uses the same crafting recipes. Upon striking enemies, the player has a 50% chance to recover 2 to 3 HP. Its best modifier is Legendary. The Bloody Edge and its upgrade were implemented based on a community suggestion made by Gouvod on the mod's Terraria Forums post.

name: Virulence
description: The Virulence is a Hardmode broadsword that autoswings and is dropped from The Plaguebringer Goliath. Upon swinging the sword, a large green cloud is fired in the direction of the player's mouse that deals 85% of the weapon's damage, pierces indefinitely, goes through tiles, and inflicts the Plague debuff on enemy hits. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Terra-cotta
description: The Terra-cotta is a Hardmode broadsword that drops from Dune Splicers after Plantera has been defeated, and is the indirect upgrade to the Burnt Sienna. Upon killing an enemy, a lingering explosion is created and small, bright-yellow globes will spawn, which heal the player for 9 HP when picked up. Its best modifier is Legendary. The orbs spawned by upon killing an enemy will home-in on the player if they are inflicted with the Heartreach buff. "Terra cotta" is a reddish-orange color (named aft

name: Darklight Greatsword
description: The Darklight Greatsword is a craftable Hardmode broadsword. When swung, it shoots darklight blades that inflict the Frostburn debuff. The darklight blades explodes after hitting an enemy or a block into 3-4 smaller orbs. It is capable of autoswing. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Trinity
description: The Trinity is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. When swung, the sword launches four glowing projectiles in a small spread. The projectiles can be red, purple, or blue, and are unaffected by gravity. The purple and blue projectiles do not pierce whereas the red projectiles pierce four times, disappearing on the fifth enemy. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Storm Saber
description: The Storm Saber is a Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It has a chance to be dropped from Cloud Elementals. When swung, it fires a slow glowing sword-like projectile from the blade, and another from the sky towards the cursor. The blade projectile deals 80% of the weapon's base damage, whereas the sky projectile deals 60%. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Crystal Blade
description: The Crystal Blade is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It can also be dropped from Crystal Crawlers. When swung, it fires a slow moving projectile consisting of colorful particles. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Fulguration Halberd
description: The Fulguration Halberd is a craftable Hardmode melee weapon that autoswings. The Fulguration Halberd can be swung both as a broadsword and a spear by pressing left and right click respectively. It will inflict Burning Blood on each successful hit. Its best modifier is Legendary. Fulguration, also called radiofrequency ablation, is a medical procedure in which unwanted tissue is removed using the heat generated from radio-frequency alternating current.

name: Aftershock
description: The Aftershock is a Hardmode broadsword that drops from Earth Elementals. Upon hitting an enemy, it spawns a boulder that falls from the sky and pierces five enemies. Its best modifier is Legendary. The Aftershock is very useful for rapidly annihilating worm-like enemies, since the falling rocks can hit several segments. Unlike most on-hit effects, the Aftershock's effect can be triggered by Target Dummies. This will not work during boss fights.

name: Celestial Claymore
description: The Celestial Claymore is a Hardmode broadsword dropped by Biome Mimics. On each swing, it will spawn 3 blue, red, or yellow flame stars at randomized locations near the player. They can spawn in an area extending above and to the sides of the player, but not below. The flames hover towards the player, faster if the player is further away, and explodes aesthetically after a few seconds. Each flame inflicts a different debuff corresponding to its color. Its best modifier is Legendary. This weapon

name: Draconic Destruction
description: The Draconic Destruction is a craftable post-Moon Lord developer broadsword that autoswings. When the main sword beam that the sword shoots dissipates, it causes 8 beams to shoot outwards from the location of impact. It will then cause a wave of tile-ignoring beams to go down, then another wave up, then one final wave down again. The sword beams also ignore NPC immunity frames. Its best modifier is Legendary. Because of the weapons large area of effect, it is more effective against larger target

name: Brimlash Buster
description: The Brimlash Buster is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. It is an upgraded version of the Brimlash. It shoots one of two projectiles randomly per swing: four brimstone bolts to the left, right, and diagonals of the player, or a large brimstone bolt aimed at the cursor, which splits into multiple smaller ones upon death. It inflicts Brimstone Flames on enemy hits. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Holy Collider
description: The Holy Collider is a post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. It is dropped by Providence, the Profaned Goddess. Upon striking an enemy, it spawns eight holy flames in an octagonal pattern that spread outwards before homing onto the closest enemy shortly after. The flames spread out faster horizontally than they do vertically, and will dissipate after one second if they did not hit an enemy. The flames can go through blocks and do not pierce. Its best modifier is Legendary. If the sword stri

name: Mirror Blade
description: The Mirror Blade is a post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. It is dropped by the Ceaseless Void. It fires projectiles that resemble a mirror. Projectiles move based on player movement. If an enemy is struck by the blade, the amount of contact damage that enemy deals is added to the weapon's damage. It cannot deal more than 750 damage. Its best modifier is Legendary. Though it initially deals noticeably less DPS than most other weapons of its tier, striking an enemy with very high contact da

name: Cnidarian
description: Not to be confused with Cnidrion, an enemy that spawns in the Desert. The Cnidarian is a craftable Pre-Hardmode yoyo. While it is thrown, the yoyo will fire out small seashell projectiles when enemies are nearby. Seashells pierce once, return to the player after a short time similarly to boomerangs, and deal 75% of the main throw's damage. When the yoyo returns to the player, it will be automatically re-thrown if they are still holding the fire button. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get m

name: Pumpler
description: The Pumpler is a craftable Pre-Hardmode gun with stats that are comparable to the Minishark, having somewhat low base damage but a very high fire rate and a chance not to consume ammo when fired. Right clicking with this weapon will fire a bouncing pumpkin that deals 140% damage and explodes upon hitting an enemy or after 5 seconds have passed. Its best modifier is Unreal.

name: Marnite Bayonet
description: The Marnite Bayonet is a craftable Pre-Hardmode gun that can be considered an earlier alternative to the Musket or The Undertaker. Upon use, it auto-fires bullets at an average rate. The gun itself also deals contact damage to enemies, a unique property for a ranged weapon that it shares with weapons such as Helstorm and Hellborn. Its best modifier is Unreal. As the gun's hitbox does not change based on aim, it will not always hit enemies that pass through the sprite. When dealing contact damage

name: Titanium Shuriken
description: Titanium Shurikens are craftable Hardmode rogue weapons. They pierce infinitely and can be recovered after hitting a block about 50% of the time. Performing a stealth strike with Titanium Shurikens causes the shuriken to behave similarly to a boomerang, bouncing off tiles and recovering the shuriken to the player 100% of the time. If the boomerang shuriken hits an enemy, 1-2 homing shurikens appear from the shuriken itself. The Titanium Shuriken cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have modi

name: Verdant
description: The Verdant is a post-Moon Lord yoyo crafted from Uelibloom Bars. If enemies are nearby, the Verdant will randomly fire leaf crystals at them, which deal 80% of the yoyo's damage. The leaves can pass through tiles but cannot pierce enemies. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Ruthless might be preferred if the player already has 100% critical strike chance.

name: Yin-Yo
description: The Yin-Yo is a craftable Hardmode yoyo. If enemies are near, the yoyo will randomly fire Dark Shards towards the target or Light Shards away from the target. Both shards will travel back and forth five times before fading away, passing through walls and piercing any number of enemies. When the yoyo returns to the player, it will be automatically re-thrown if they are still holding the fire button. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Although this weapon has low

name: Speed Blaster
description: The Speed Blaster is a craftable Hardmode ranged weapon that acts as a direct upgrade to the vanilla Paintball Gun. It fires in rapid bursts of six paintballs, and like the Paintball Gun, it does not consume ammo, making it a very reliable weapon. Its high damage potential is somewhat offset by the gravity effect drop and relatively low projectile velocity. Its best modifier is Unreal. The Calamity Mod allows the Painter to sell the Paintball Gun, allowing the player to obtain the weapon without

name: Spectre Rifle
description: The Spectre Rifle is a craftable Hardmode gun that turns any Musket Balls into high-velocity, homing Spectre projectiles that chase enemies. Its high damage and critical strike chance give it excellent one-off damage potential, but a relatively slow fire rate brings it down in fights against large crowds. Holding right click will use its "zoom" ability, which scrolls the viewing area of the screen in the direction of the cursor. Its best modifier is Unreal. This weapon's seeker projectiles are e

name: Leviatitan
description: If you were looking for something other than the Leviatitan, see Leviathan (disambiguation). The Leviatitan is a Hardmode gun which is dropped by the Leviathan and Anahita. It converts Musket Balls into sea water blasts, with a 1/4 chance of firing a poisonous sea water blast instead, which inflicts both the Poisoned and Venom debuffs onto enemies. Its best modifier is Unreal. The name of this weapon is a portmanteau of the words "Leviathan" and "Titan".

name: Pestilent Defiler
description: The Pestilent Defiler is a Hardmode gun that is dropped by The Plaguebringer Goliath. It fills the role of a sniper rifle, slowly firing extremely powerful shots at high velocity. If Musket Balls are used as ammo, bullets are converted into plague rounds that inflict Plague, Poisoned and Venom debuffs, causing up to 360 additional damage over several seconds. This plague round also splits into three smaller projectiles on impact that fly in random directions, potentially hitting other nearby ene

name: Mineral Mortar
description: The Mineral Mortar is a craftable Hardmode launcher that fires projectiles shaped like Forbidden Fragments. Upon collision with a block, this projectile splits into four flying Sand Shark-shaped projectiles that spread out and do additional damage. Neither the initial rocket nor the sharks can hit more than one enemy, though the initial blast has a small area of effect which ignores enemy immunity frames. Its best modifier is Unreal. Since the sharks released by the weapon slightly home towards

name: Scorpio
description: The Scorpio is a craftable Hardmode launcher with extraordinary area-of-effect capabilities. Its two firing modes both consume a single rocket of any kind upon firing. Left-click gives a fully automatic rapid-fire stream of homing rockets that inflict the weapon's normal damage. Right-click is also automatic, slowly firing seeker rockets that inflict 1.25x the weapon's normal damage and double the knockback, in a ludicrously large area of effect (square radius of 22.5 tiles). Despite its lower f

name: Mycelial Claws
description: The Mycelial Claws are a Pre-Hardmode melee weapon that drops from Crabulon. The claws feature an extremely fast swing speed and very short range, a similar functionality to the Fetid Baghnakhs. Its best modifier is Legendary. When paired with the Fungal Symbiote this weapon can decimate enemies and even some Pre-Hardmode bosses extremely quickly. The Mandible Claws are an acceptable substitue, which are nearly identical in stats except for a very slightly reduced knockback.

name: Comet Quasher
description: The Comet Quasher is a craftable Hardmode broadsword that autoswings. The sword does not fire any projectile when swung, but summons 3 falling meteors towards the mouse cursor whenever it strikes an enemy. The meteors resemble those summoned by the Meteor Staff and deal half the damage of the sword hit that spawned them. Its best modifier is Legendary.

name: Stellar Striker
description: The Stellar Striker is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that is a direct upgrade of the Comet Quasher. Every time the sword strikes an enemy, two lunar flares fall from the sky towards the cursor, which explode upon contact with enemies or upon hitting tiles that are below the cursor. Each flare deals equal damage to the sword strike which spawned it. Its best modifier is Legendary. The Old Duke takes only 80% damage from the Stellar Striker.

name: Neptune's Bounty
description: Neptune's Bounty is a craftable post-Moon Lord broadsword that autoswings. It is a direct upgrade to the Abyss Blade and the final upgrade to the Depth Crusher. When swung, it fires a small trident that pierces infinitely and regularly rains more small tridents under itself as it travels. The small spawned tridents deal 50% of the weapon's damage, home in on enemies, do not pierce enemies, and burst into a water explosion on contact, dealing additional damage to nearby enemies equal to the proje

name: Oblivion
description: The Oblivion is a Hardmode yoyo dropped by Calamitas. While in use, it fires brimstone lasers at nearby enemies which deal half of the yoyo's damage. Both the lasers and the yoyo inflict Brimstone Flames. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Brimstone lasers appear near the yoyo instead of emitting from it directly. If the yoyo is pressed to a wall or is in a tight space, the lasers may disappear immediately and not be able to hit enemies. This weapon was previou

name: Shimmerspark
description: The Shimmerspark is a craftable Hardmode yoyo. If enemies are nearby, the yoyo will randomly fire slow-moving purple stars at them. The fired stars can pierce one enemy but will not go through walls. When the yoyo returns to the player, another one will be automatically thrown if they are still holding the fire button. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. The Shimmerspark will not perfectly follow the cursor while thrown. When using the Yoyo Glove or Yoyo Bag, th

name: Quagmire
description: The Quagmire is a craftable Hardmode yoyo. While in use, the yoyo randomly and continuously emits spore clouds which deal 50% to 70% of the yoyo's damage. Only the yoyo itself inflicts the Venom debuff. When the yoyo returns to the player, it will be automatically re-thrown if they are still holding the fire button. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. A quagmire or mire is the general name for wetland areas such as bogs, fens, marshes or swamps.

name: Pandemic
description: The Pandemic is a Hardmode yoyo dropped by The Plaguebringer Goliath. Similar to the Oblivion, the Pandemic constantly fires plague seekers at nearby enemies; plague seekers deal 75% of the yoyo's damage. Both the yoyo and its plague seeker projectiles inflict the Plague debuff. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. A pandemic is a real world event where a dangerous disease spreads to multiple different countries and regions.

name: The Obliterator
description: The Obliterator is a post-Moon Lord yoyo dropped by The Devourer of Gods. Unlike other yoyos, The Obliterator ignores NPC immunity frames, allowing it to rapidly bounce off of enemies and inflict much more damage than its damage stat would indicate. If enemies are nearby, The Obliterator will rapidly fire nebula lasers which do 25% less damage than the yoyo itself. The nebula lasers inflict the Frostburn and On Fire! debuffs. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Sausage Maker
description: The Sausage Maker is a craftable Pre-Hardmode spear dropped by The Perforators. It can also be crafted from Vertebrae, Crimtane Bars and Blood Samples at an Altar. Upon contact with an enemy, a blood bolt will be fired out that homes in on enemies. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Real-life sausage makers take meat, condense it, and push it out as a sausage. This could mean that when you strike an enemy, their flesh is condensed into the weapon, then it spits

name: Urchin Spear
description: The Urchin Spear is a craftable Pre-Hardmode spear. When used, it shoots a stinger that homes in slowly on enemies and inflicts the Poisoned and Venom debuffs. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Starnight Lance
description: The Starnight Lance is a craftable Hardmode spear. On each swing it will fire out a projectile that inflicts the Frostburn debuff that pierces two enemies, disappearing on the third. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Hellion Flower Spear
description: The Hellion Flower Spear is a craftable Hardmode spear. On each swing it fires out a projectile that pierces blocks and enemies twice, while also inflicting the Venom debuff to any hit enemy. Whenever the spear or the projectile inflicts a critical hit, a single petal, such as those from Orichalcum armor, will fly in toward the target's position. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Terra Lance
description: The Terra Lance is a craftable Hardmode spear. When swung, it will fire out a projectile that deals 70% of the spear's damage and knockback, pierces infinite enemies, and goes through blocks. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Earthen Pike
description: The Earthern Pike is a Hardmode spear dropped by the Earth Elemental. Enemies struck by this weapon are inflicted with the Armor Crunch debuff, greatly reducing their defense temporarily. On swing, the spear releases four fossil shards that deal 50 percent of the spear's damage and can additionally inflict Armor Crunch. The fossil shards are affected by gravity, and cannot travel upward; aiming the spear's swing further upward will only cause the shards to be fired with less horizontal speed. It

name: Diseased Pike
description: The Diseased Pike is a Hardmode spear dropped by The Plaguebringer Goliath. On enemy hits, it will fire out plague seekers that deal 75% of the weapon's damage and inflict Plague debuff. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Heart Rapier
description: The Heart Rapier was a craftable Hardmode spear. Whenever it damaged an enemy, it healed the player for 5 HP. Its best modifier was Godly. A rapier is a slender, pointed sword used by thrusting into the opponent.

name: Brimlance
description: The Brimlance is a Hardmode spear that drops from Brimstone Elemental. Upon hitting an enemy, it will inflict the Brimstone Flames debuff. Enemies hit by this weapon spawn brimstone explosions and drop brimstone flames. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size.

name: Gilded Proboscis
description: The Gilded Proboscis is a post-Moon Lord spear that is dropped from The Dragonfolly. It heals the player for 1 HP each time it deals damage. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Ruthless might be preferred if the player already has 100% critical strike chance.

name: Stream Gouge
description: The Stream Gouge is a craftable post-Moon Lord spear. This weapon ignores enemy immunity frames and shoots out a spear clone which pierces up to 9 enemies, and inflicts God Slayer Inferno debuff. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Ruthless might be preferred if the player already has 100% critical strike chance.

name: Eldritch Tome
description: The Eldritch Tome is a Pre-Hardmode spell tome that drops from The Slime God. When used, it fires three red tendrils which bend in random directions, similarly to the Shadowflame Hex Doll. It is the Crimson counterpart to the Abyssal Tome. Its best modifier is Mythical.

name: Elemental Lance
description: The Elemental Lance is a craftable post-Moon Lord spear. It fires one gravity-affected cyan beam that splits into more beams with similar properties. Each usage of the Elemental Lance results in 162 orange beams at most, if the blue and pink beams do not prematurely dissipate on enemies. All beams can move through blocks and inflict the Elemental Mix debuffs for two seconds on contact. Its best modifier is Godly. It cannot get modifiers that affect size. Ruthless might be preferred if the player

name: The Wand
description: The Wand is a craftable post-Moon Lord wand. It fires a small projectile that inflicts On Fire! and Daybroken, and erupts into a massive translucent infernado on impact with any tile or enemy. If the infernado triggers in mid-air, it will attempt to spawn on the nearest solid surface below it. Only 1 infernado can exist at a time. Its extremely low base damage applies only to the initial projectile. The infernado it creates can extend upwards through solid blocks and ignores enemy invulnerabilit

name: Decapodita Sprout
description: The Decapodita Sprout is a craftable Pre-Hardmode item used to summon the Crabulon boss in the Glowing Mushroom biome. Its name is a portmanteau of the words decapoda and amanita. Decapoda is an order of crustaceans which contains crabs, lobsters, and shrimp. Amanita is a genus that contains around 600 species of capped mushrooms.

name: Cosmic Elemental
description: If you were looking for something other than the Pre-Hardmode enemy, see Cosmic (disambiguation). The Cosmic Elemental is a Pre-Hardmode enemy that spawns in the Cavern. They behave the same as Granite Elementals, flying through walls and rolling into a ball when damaged in Expert Mode. Upon death, the Cosmic Elemental has a chance to drop a number of rare swords that are otherwise not obtainable through conventional means. The Cosmic Elemental always applies the Confused debuff on hit players f

name: Plasma Rod
description: The Plasma Rod is a Pre-Hardmode wand obtained from the Goblin Sorcerer and Tim. It shoots a beam that inflicts many debuffs at once to hit enemies. If it hits a tile instead, it will explode into eight smaller beams with higher damage. Due to the random spread of smaller beams, some may find it difficult to aim smaller beams at the enemy. The direct hit of the wand can inflict 5 different debuffs at once: Shadowflame for 1 second Ichor for 2 seconds Frostburn for 3 seconds On Fire! for 4 second

name: Seashell Boomerang
description: The Seashell Boomerang is a craftable Pre-Hardmode boomerang. Unlike other early game boomerangs, it is capable of throwing an unlimited amount of boomerangs at once, which all return to the player after traveling a short distance. Its best modifier is Flawless.

name: Mandible Claws
description: The Mandible Claws are a Pre-Hardmode melee weapon that drops from Antlions, Antlion Chargers, and Antlion Swarmers. The claws feature an extremely fast swing speed and very short range, functioning similarly to the Fetid Baghnakhs. Its best modifier is Legendary. The Mandible Claws are especially effective against Antlion Chargers; they are able to bring them to a complete stop, allowing the weapon to deal extremely high damage and keep the player safe. The Fungal Symbiote is extremely effectiv

name: Crabulon
description: "A crab and its mushrooms, a love story." Crabulon is a Pre-Hardmode boss. It has the appearance of a giant, gray, fungus-covered crab, with several glowing mushrooms attached to it. Crabulon is summoned by using the Decapodita Sprout in a Glowing Mushroom biome. When spawned, Crabulon will be passive towards the player, completely still and dealing no contact damage. While Crabulon is passive, the player is granted the Mushy buff, increasing defense by 5 and life regen by 1. It will become host

name: Illustrious Knives
description: The Illustrious Knives are a craftable post-Moon Lord developer weapon. When used, the weapon launches a spread of 4-8 slow moving green knives, similar to the Vampire Knives. The knives are destroyed upon contact with tiles, but will rapidly accelerate and home in on nearby enemies. All knives will inflict Holy Flames upon striking an enemy. When a knife hits an enemy, the player is healed by 1.5% of the damage dealt. This lifesteal is far stronger than either the Vampire or Empyrean Knives. It

name: Crushsaw Crasher
description: The Crushsaw Crasher is a Hardmode rogue weapon that has a 8.33% (10%) chance to drop from Catastrophe. When used it auto-fires a homing, spinning axe that can pierce one enemy or bounce once before disappearing on its next impact. The axe inflicts Brimstone Flames upon any enemy it hits. Performing a stealth strike with the Crushsaw Crasher will cause five axes to be thrown instead of one. Its best modifier is Flawless. This weapon does not benefit from the effects of the Invisibility Potion or

name: Meteor Fist
description: The Meteor Fist is a craftable Pre-Hardmode bomb that fires a high-velocity projectile which leaves a particle trail behind. The projectile is slightly affected by gravity, and explodes on contact with enemies or solid blocks. The explosion ignores enemy immunity frames. Performing a stealth strike with the Meteor Fist will cause the next fist thrown to bounce between enemies up to four times before exploding. Its best modifier is Flawless. The particle trail it leaves behind is very useful for

name: The Dance of Light
description: The Dance of Light is a craftable post-Moon Lord developer spell tome. Upon use, it rapidly summons four pairs of fast inaccurate Light Blade projectiles from a cone around the player towards the cursor's direction. Each pair of light blades will curve, converge, and home with each other; each projectile piercing up to two targets and pass through tiles. Once the blades have struck something 300 times, all nearby blades vanish and a flash of light appears from above to damage all enemies in a la

name: Goobow
description: The Goobow is a craftable Pre-Hardmode bow that auto-fires. It will fire two short streams of slime alongside the arrows it fires. Its best modifier is Unreal.

name: Mandible Bow
description: The Mandible Bow is a Pre-Hardmode bow. It is dropped by Antlions, Antlion Chargers, and Antlion Swarmers. It fires arrows at a very high velocity. Its best modifier is Unreal. The Mandible Bow is tied with the Arterial Assault and Clockwork Bow for the highest velocity of any bow.

name: Lunarian Bow
description: The Lunarian Bow is a craftable Pre-Hardmode bow that auto-fires. It fires two arrows. If Wooden Arrows are used as ammo, it instead fires straight beams that are not affected by gravity and can bounce on a block once; however, the bolts will slide on the hit block rather than bounce off of it. Its best modifier is Unreal.

name: Bladedge Railbow
description: The Bladedge Railbow is a craftable Hardmode repeater. It fires out 4 arrows at once, quickly followed by a pair of leaves. The leaves inflict no knockback and deal 50% of the weapon's base damage. Its best modifier is Unreal. It used to be called Bladedge Greatbow and, like its name would suggest, looked like a bow.

name: Darkecho Greatbow
description: The Darkecho Greatbow is a craftable Hardmode bow. It fires 2 arrows at once and a crystal dart that bounces around, hitting up to 3 targets nearby. Its best modifier is Unreal.

name: The Ballista
description: The Ballista is a craftable Hardmode bow that auto-fires. It converts Wooden Arrows into special arrows that can pierce one enemy and shatter into fossil shards upon hitting a second, as well as upon hitting solid blocks. Fossil shards deal 20% of the weapon's base damage. All projectiles will inflict the Armor Crunch debuff. Its best modifier is Unreal.
